protocols.protocol: source P232277 = RIME 3/1, p. 040, E3/1.1.7, St D

xff:f.sense: to give birth (to), bear a child

l.exosig: @epsd2/epsdc/royal%sux:ba-ni-sa₂-sa₂=sa[equal//to equal, compare, compete, be equal to, rival]V/t'V/t$ba.ni:sa/sa₂-sa₂#ba.ni:~
